snippet: An internal inquiry found that the recertification exam, with answers, was circulated to security guards at the Y-12 complex, where an 82-year-old nun was able to reach a bomb fuel storage building.
abstract: Internal investigation by Energy Department finds that security guards at nuclear weapons plant Y-12 National Security Complex, near Oak Ridge, Tenn, cheated on recertification exam; facility is same one that activist nun Sister Megan Gillespie Rice breached in July 2012.
lead_paragraph: An internal inquiry found that the recertification exam, with answers, was circulated to security guards at the Y-12 complex, where an 82-year-old nun was able to reach a bomb fuel storage building.

headline.seo: Exam Leaked to Guards at Y-12 Nuclear Site, Inquiry Finds
headline.main: Exam Said to Be Leaked to Guards at Nuclear Site
headline.print_headline: Exam Said to Be Leaked To Guards at Nuclear Site
